# nexaa_message_queue_plans (Data Source)

Fetches the plan ID for a message queue based on resource requirements.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cpu` (Number) Number of CPU cores required
- `memory` (Number) Memory in GB required
- `replicas` (Number) Number of replicas required
- `storage` (Number) Storage in GB required

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Plan identifier
